Welcome to the amazing 1.5 beta release of Revival. This is the most expansive update to the game yet including these major features: * Stonehenge and Abyss Armor & Weapons including original names & stats. * 6x Stonehenge Helms, 3x Abyss Armor Sets * Sunblade, Sunshield, Moonblade, Gleamcarver, Dissector, Dissector Shield * Vigilante, Hellbore, Fry Baby, Core Magnum, Thumper, Thunderclash * Fire Seeds, Negatron, Singularity Node, 3x Focus Items (yes, including Slippies!) * The incredible particle updates from Abyss. * Background environment updates from Abyss. * New community item loots! * Mythic & Double-Edged qualities.
Brand new game experience. Although you can play your higher level characters, we would recommend starting a new one so you can reep the full benefits update.
